channel.title: [PI] Saving your login info
channel.description:
I downloaded InsanityX and the client saves your login details. So everytime you run the client your username and password are already entered. [b]I want to disable this feature so you have to type your login details each time the client loads.[/b]
I have looked for solutions, and I have deleted all setuid codes. Please Help :)

item.title: [PI] Saving your login info
item.dc:creator: @Gsempire Gsempire
item.description:

I downloaded InsanityX and the client saves your login details. So everytime you run the client your username and password are already entered. I want to disable this feature so you have to type your login details each time the client loads.
